definitions.definition: To grow or increase stature ; to grow vigorously or luxuriantly , to flourish .
examples: Not all animals thrive well in captivity.

definitions.definition: To increase in wealth or success; to prosper , be profitable.
examples: Since expanding in June, the business has really thrived .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To grow or increase stature ; to grow vigorously or luxuriantly , to flourish .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To increase in wealth or success; to prosper , be profitable.
